item.title: Atom.io now works on German keyboards!
item.description: Summary: If you have problems with non us-keyboards and the editor Atom.io install this package: keyboard-localization Shortly longer: Ok, I blogged about my problems with Atom.io before (and before) and the underlying issues aren’t fixed in the chromium parts of Atom.io. Yet there were workarounds: For example I created my own keybinding file, which fixed my most important issue the missing “@” sign (who is using that, anyway?). Now I needed an working “\” in my elixir code.
